title: Award-Winning Vietnam Beachfront Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
At the point where lush jungle hinterland melts into the brilliant blue waters of the South China Sea, award-winning luxury awaits. Banyan Tree Lang Co offers a five-star beachfront stay that’s equal parts exclusive and serene, cradled by central Vietnam’s tremendous natural beauty. A world away from the everyday, this resort is nevertheless close to some of the region’s best UNESCO World Heritage-listed sights, including Hoi An’s lantern-strewn streets and extraordinary banh mi, the historic remains of the Forbidden Purple Palace in Hue and My Son, an ancient sanctuary steeped in spiritual mystery. Return to your luxury villa, featuring a spectacular private pool, for quiet romantic moments as the sun ignites the horizon.

Golfers will love the resort’s 18-hole championship course, while those seeking restoration and renewal will adore the acclaimed onsite spa. The dining is naturally impeccable - sample fine teas or barista-poured coffee at Thu Quan, head to Azura for Mediterranean-inspired seafood bites by the sea or savour fiery Thai fine dining and sweeping hilltop views at Banyan Tree’s signature restaurant, Saffron.
offer_address: Cu Du Village Loc Vinh Commune Phu Loc District, Hue, Thua Thien Hue 49000, Vietnam

title: BEST OF 2019: Award-Winning Pool Villa Luxury with Bottomless Sparkling Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description: Experience an ultra-luxurious escape at the multi-award-winning Banyan Tree Lăng Cô - named one of The Best Resorts in the World by Condé Nast Traveler - a beachfront paradise nestled between azure waters and lush mountains within the impressive Laguna Lăng Cô complex ⁠- the first world-class integrated resort in Vietnam. Step into a world of unspoiled natural beauty and unparalleled luxury as you enjoy deluxe daily buffet breakfast with free-flow sparkling wine, two set-menu dinners during your stay, nightly cocktails, a 60-minute massage and return airport transfers from Da Nang Airport.
offer_address: Cu Du Village Loc Vinh Commune Phu Loc District, Hue, Thua Thien Hue 49000, Vietnam
